wikipedia_page.main: Jack Waller (born 6 October 1989 in Welwyn Garden City, Hertfordshire, England) is a British water polo player who plays as a centre forward. At the 2012 Summer Olympics, he competed for the Great Britain men's national water polo team in the men's event. He is 6 ft 1.5 inches tall.
